title: Nipongo
sinopse:
Satou Sayaka attends an international girls' high school, which is full of exchange students from different countries! This 4-koma manga follows their daily school life, focusing primarily on Japanese Satou, Russian Sasha, American Mary, and Chinese Meimei.

(Source: MangaHelpers)

Included one-shot:
Volume 3: Nipongo (pilot)
